title: Roast vegetable and lentil salad
description: A large colourful salad that is full of flavour and goodness.
ingredients: 4 medium beetroot, peeled cut into wedges
½ butternut squash, peeled cut into cubes
cumin seeds, lightly crushed in a pestle and mortar
coriander seeds, lightly crushed in a pestle and mortar
salt and freshly ground black pepper
